author: protolambda
content: Hahaha, I'm still not happy with my old schematic of the spec. And the spec has improved a lot since then. I already redid the visuals for the epoch transition (optimized also!), you can find it in my edu docs repo. And I'm thinking of doing a full write-up on how to write a client from scratch (ignoring the software engineering part of services, datastore use and logging etc. Just the specced part). Anyone interested?

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <leobago> actually I have been thinking about such a write-up for some time, so I would be happy to help with that task

author: protolambda
content: <@!570268431522201601> <@!478543974156730369> Great, thanks for the help. I can make a start on that tomorrow. Do you prefer telegram or discord to work together on the write-up?

author: mratsim
content: I'm agnostic thoguh I tend to mute telegram and not see mentions on discord ;). Note that I will be in Brussels from Friday to Friday doing the "interop" so I would probably have less availablility

author: protolambda
content: no problem, can't complete it in one day anyway. I'll create a channel in this discord server for educational resources
